summary: A collection of unit tests that validate the QPY format's ability to correctly serialize and deserialize quantum circuits, checking roundâ€‘trip fidelity, preservation of layout and calibration data, handling of symengine configuration, and proper version compatibility enforcement.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and backward/forward compatibility of Qiskit's QPY circuit storage, enabling developers and users to reliably save, share, and reload circuits with all relevant metadata and features intact.
